Crew: Sir, we are in artillery firing range!

Jotunn: Autoguns, fire at wil=
l, designated targets only! I want a
Defense crew here to protect the ships=
. Everybody else, attack!

He opened a hatch and threw himself in the air. =
He was freefalling,
but used a passing sweep to break his fall, colliding f=
or a second
only, then landing abruptly on his feet.

Jotunn: DRAGON CORPS,=
 LIVE FOREVER!

He located the nearest sweep and fired a sustained barrage =
with his
gatling gun.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <robori=
ck007@...> wrote:

>

in good order he sat back.

od luck to all.

smiled: I am glad I have your support. Grimlock, there'll be
>=

deserving leaves with the Matrix. Now get ready, we're here soon.

now. Artillery range in

e good to go!

cial bullets

ignate them

ange attacks. It's their priority to disengage melee attack.

ent the message.

own in thought. Jotunn was leading the group in a very

ws that to fight what they are faced with it may be

orts shuddered as they left the dock but, as they cleared,

bound for

anding by.

sarray and

grou=
nd team

me
back

ified its approval. Jotunn then looked over to Grimlock
